name: Rock Paper Wizards!
description:
role-playing system that doesn’t require any dice!  If you know how to play rock paper scissors, then you know the basics for how to play rock paper wizards!

 Fight your way through a castle of traps and cleverly kill your enemies as you try to retrieve your stolen spell book using the few spells you’ve managed to remember from your book!  Though you may have remembered the hand gestures a bit wrong...
